metadata.title: Zythogora
metadata.description: The ultimate app for beer reviews

welcome.subject: Welcome to Zythogora
welcome.title: Welcome to <highlight>Zythogora</highlight>
welcome.text: We are happy to count you among us {username}!
welcome.text2: You can activate your account by clicking the button below.
welcome.buttonFallback: If the button does not work, you can also copy and paste the following URL into your browser: <link>{activationUrl}</link>.

resetPassword.subject: Reset your Zythogora password
resetPassword.text:
Hello {username},

You have requested to reset your password for your Zythogora account.
resetPassword.text2: To reset your password, click the button below.
resetPassword.text3: If you did not request this, you can safely ignore this email.
resetPassword.buttonFallback: If the button does not work, you can also copy and paste the following URL into your browser: <link>{resetPasswordUrl}</link>.

friendRequest.subject: New friend request on Zythogora
friendRequest.preview: {requesterUsername} wants to be your friend on Zythogora
friendRequest.title:
New friend request on

Zythogora
friendRequest.text:
Hello {addresseeUsername}!

{requesterUsername} wants to be your friend on Zythogora!
friendRequest.acceptCta: To accept this request, click the button below.
friendRequest.acceptButtonFallback: If the button does not work, you can also copy and paste the following URL into your browser: <link>{acceptFriendRequestUrl}</link>.
friendRequest.rejectCta: If you do not know {requesterUsername} or do not want to accept this request, <link>click here</link>.

friendRequestAccepted.subject: Your friend request has been accepted on Zythogora
friendRequestAccepted.preview: {addresseeUsername} accepted your friend request on Zythogora
friendRequestAccepted.title:
You got a new friend on

Zythogora üçª
friendRequestAccepted.text:
Hello {requesterUsername}!

{addresseeUsername} accepted your friend request on Zythogora!

errors.PASSWORD_INVALID: That does not look like a valid password
errors.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your account is not verified, an email has been sent to you

errors.USERNAME_TOO_SHORT: The username has to be at least 3 characters long
errors.USERNAME_TOO_LONG: The username cannot be longer than 25 characters
errors.USERNAME_INVALID_CHARACTERS: The username can only contain numbers, letters and underscores (_)

An email has been sent to you

to verify your account.
emailVerification.text:
Check your mailbox and click on the link

to be able to sign-in!
emailVerification.success: Your email has been verified with success, you are now connected!

passwordForgotten.title: Password forgotten
passwordForgotten.description: Enter your email below to receive an email to reset your password.
passwordForgotten.success: An email to reset your password has been sent to {email} if this address is associated with an account.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password

actions.requestNewToken:
The token is invalid or has expired.

Request a new one here.

resetPassword.success: Your password has been reset with success, you can now sign in!

errors.INVALID_TOKEN: The token is invalid or has expired

largeCards.first:
It's the beer review app that goes deep into the tasting process.



From appearance and aromas to mouthfeel and duration, Zythogora allows you to describe in detail all your impressions on the beers you've tasted.
largeCards.second: Keep track of your tasting history, create lists to organize your favorites, follow your friends' discoveries, and much more with Zythogora!

free.title: Free
free.description:
Because we want our love of craft beer to be shared by as many people as possible, it didn't make sense to limit the use of Zythogora to a monthly subscription.



So, whatever your means, you can keep track of the little gems you discover for free!

adFree.title: Ad-free
adFree.description: Because selling your brain time to large advertising groups whose only goal is to make as much money as possible at the expense of the living world, or making the promotion of this marvellous new industrial beer or of this incredible state-of-the-art tap machine, is not in line with Zythogora's values.

openSource.title: Open-source
openSource.description:
Because in a time when algorithms control more and more aspects of our lives, we're convinced that fully transparent solutions are essential for building a better future.



Therefore, you can explore Zythogora's source code, contribute to it, or even decide not to use this site and host your own version at home.

donate.description: However, if you can afford it and love Zythogora, you can make a donation to support the project!

metadata.description: {username} has tasted a {beerName} from {breweryName} {servingFrom, select, DRAFT {on draught} BOTTLE {in a bottle} CAN {in a can} GROWLER {from a growler} CASK {from a cask pump} other {}} and rated it {score}/10 on {reviewDate, date, long}. Read the full review on Zythogora.

errors.EXPLICIT_CONTENT_CHECK: An error occurred while checking for explicit content

errors.IMAGE_OPTIMIZATION: An error occurred while processing the image
errors.FILE_UPLOAD: An error occurred while uploading the image
errors.SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: An error occurred while submitting the review

errors.MIN_RELEASE_YEAR_ERROR: The release year cannot be before the year 1000
errors.MAX_RELEASE_YEAR_ERROR: The release year cannot be in the future

errors.MIN_CREATION_YEAR_ERROR: The creation year cannot be before the year 1000
errors.MAX_CREATION_YEAR_ERROR: The creation year cannot be in the future
